mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, mySize = #{mySize}, itemOptionNo=#{itemOptionNo}, star = #{star} where reviewNo = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert: insert into review(reviewNo,id,content,height,weight,mySize,itemOptionNo,ref,ansnum) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(reviewNo), 0) + 1 as no FROM review),#{id},#{content},#{height},#{weight},#{mySize},#{itemOptionNo}, #{ref},#{ansnum}+1)
